roleset.name: hunt a species or area to the point of damaging the herd

example.name: overhunt-v
example.text: If a predator overhunts its prey , the prey population will lower to numbers that are too scarce for the predators to find .

example.name: overhunt-v
example.text: For extra fun, make the chain a circle that leads back to the goblins, who have overhunted the region and crashed the ecosystem.

roleset.note: OVERHUNT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.
